name: market for building, budget hotel | building, budget hotel | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21656/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'building, budget hotel', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of building, budget hotel,  a touristic accommodation classified as comfort category 3 star. The construction of the infrastructure includes energy and water used in construction, land transformation, building structure and outer building shell. The hotel building has a lifetime of 75 years, while maintenance is included only through the replacement of exchanges with shorter lifetime, like windows with a lifetime of 35 years. The hotel has a capacity  between 2,956,500 and 6,460,500 guest nights. Users should consult the specific geography of this infrastructure for more detailed information.                                                                                        

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
